channel.title: Functional Programming on The Working R Programmer
channel.description: Recent content in Functional Programming on The Working R Programmer

item.title: The Cost of Constructors
item.description: So, err, I wanted to compare the performance of linked lists versus R vectors on a case where the former is expected to perform better than the second: building a sequence one element at a time.

item.title: Thunks and Trampolines
item.description: Have you ever written a recursive function that you couldn’t use because you ran out of stack space when you applied it to large data sizes? Then thunks and trampolines might be for you.
